theDuelist:PredaplantSarraceniant.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Predaplant NL Summon 1. NL Whenever you are attacked, apply !M! Poison to ALL enemies.

theDuelist:PredaplantSpinodionaea.NAME: P. Spinodionaea
theDuelist:PredaplantSpinodionaea.DESCRIPTION: Predaplant NL Summon 1. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If you Tribute this monster for an Insect or Plant, add a random Predaplant card to your hand.
theDuelist:PredaplantSpinodionaea.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Predaplant NL Summon 1. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If you Tribute this monster for an Insect or Plant, add a random Predaplant card to your hand.

theDuelist:EmpressMantis.NAME: Empress Mantis
theDuelist:EmpressMantis.DESCRIPTION: Insect NL Tribute 1. NL Deal !D! damage.
theDuelist:EmpressMantis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Insect NL Tribute 1. NL Deal !D! damage.

theDuelist:Grasschopper.NAME: Grasschopper
theDuelist:Grasschopper.DESCRIPTION: Insect NL Tribute 2. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies for each Insect or Plant you Tribute to play this.
theDuelist:Grasschopper.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Insect NL Tribute 3. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies for each Insect or Plant you Tribute to play this.

theDuelist:ManEaterBug.NAME: Man-Eater Bug
theDuelist:ManEaterBug.DESCRIPTION: Insect NL Summon 1. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If you Tribute this for an Insect or Plant, deal !M! damage to all enemies.
theDuelist:ManEaterBug.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Insect NL Summon 1. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If you Tribute this for an Insect or Plant, deal !M! damage to all enemies.

theDuelist:Predapruning.NAME: Predapruning
theDuelist:Predapruning.DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! Plant monster to Resummon from your discard pile. NL If you choose a Predaplant monster, add a copy of it to your hand.
theDuelist:Predapruning.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! Plant monsters to Resummon from your discard pile. NL If you choose a Predaplant monster, add a copy of it to your hand.

theDuelist:BSkullDragon.NAME: B. Skull Dragon
theDuelist:BSkullDragon.DESCRIPTION: Dragon NL Tribute 3. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If you Tribute a Dragon to play this, add a 0-cost copy of Summoned Skull to your hand.
theDuelist:BSkullDragon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Dragon NL Tribute 3. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If you Tribute a Dragon to play this, add a 0-cost copy of Summoned Skull to your hand.

theDuelist:DarkfireDragon.NAME: Darkfire Dragon
theDuelist:DarkfireDragon.DESCRIPTION: Dragon NL Tribute 3. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Channel a Shadow.
theDuelist:DarkfireDragon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Dragon NL Tribute 3. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Channel a Shadow.

theDuelist:TrihornedDragon.NAME: Tri-Horned Dragon
theDuelist:TrihornedDragon.DESCRIPTION: Dragon NL Tribute 3. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Channel a random Orb for each Dragon you Tribute to play this.
theDuelist:TrihornedDragon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Dragon NL Tribute 3. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Channel a random Orb for each Dragon you Tribute to play this.

theDuelist:Wiretap.NAME: Wiretap
theDuelist:Wiretap.DESCRIPTION: Copy a random card in your hand.
theDuelist:Wiretap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Copy two random cards in your hand.

theDuelist:OceanDragonLord.NAME: Ocean Dragon Lord
theDuelist:OceanDragonLord.DESCRIPTION: Dragon NL Tribute 5. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Channel a Splash.
theDuelist:OceanDragonLord.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Dragon NL Tribute 3. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Channel a Splash.

theDuelist:LeviaDragon.NAME: Levia-Dragon
theDuelist:LeviaDragon.DESCRIPTION: Dragon NL Tribute 2. NL Channel a Splash.
theDuelist:LeviaDragon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Dragon NL Tribute 1. NL Channel a Splash.

theDuelist:DragonCaptureJar.NAME: Dragon Capture Jar
theDuelist:DragonCaptureJar.DESCRIPTION: Dragons that are played are added back to your hand at the start of your next turn.
theDuelist:DragonCaptureJar.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Dragons that are played are added back to your hand at the start of your next turn.

theDuelist:GuardianAngel.NAME: Guardian Angel Joan
theDuelist:GuardianAngel.DESCRIPTION: Tribute 2 NL Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !M! extra damage for each Spellcaster you Tribute. NL Heal for however much total damage is done.
theDuelist:GuardianAngel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Tribute 2 NL Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !M! extra damage for each Spellcaster you Tribute. NL Heal for however much total damage is done.

theDuelist:ShadowToken.NAME: Shadow Token
theDuelist:ShadowToken.DESCRIPTION: When Tributed, increases the Passive and Evoke amounts of all Shadow Orbs by 1.
theDuelist:ShadowToken.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When Tributed, increases the Passive and Evoke amounts of all Shadow Orbs by 1.

theDuelist:WingedDragonRa.NAME: Winged Dragon Ra
theDuelist:WingedDragonRa.DESCRIPTION: Tribute 4. NL Deal !D! damage X times.
theDuelist:WingedDragonRa.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Tribute 3. NL Deal !D! damage X times.
